title: Ep. 64: Wild-Card Wrap-up Featuring Shea Serrano
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark discuss how the Packers pulled away from the Giants (1:10), Pittsburgh's victory over Miami (12:29), and the Lions' loss to the Seahawks (20:22). Then, Shea Serrano joins the show to analyze the Texans' big win over the Raiders (26:15).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
